title: Azul
description: Medieval music from Portugal and Spain, including many authentic period works. A feeling of warm climate and sophistication.

title: Boss Monster
description: Chiptunes version of classic pop and rock songs. Upbeat and nerdy!

title: Brass Birmingham
description: Classical pieces fit for a burgeoning industry. Proud and hopeful!

title: Calico
description: Cozy and chill, like the warm nuzzle of a gently purring kitten come to rest.

title: Captain Sonar
description: Hectic and unnerving. A constant reminder of your imminent claustrophobic demise, a countdown to the cold abyss!

title: Carcassonne
description: French medieval music played by modern artists. A stroll through the historic countryside with the sun at your back.

title: Drakborgen
description: Eerie athmopheric soundscapes and spooky noises. Dank dungeouns, dark corridors, and a lurking dragon at the heart of the fortress!

title: Gloom
description: Melancholy instrumentals and classic peieces. Music for a funeral, for a tragedy, for a beautiful parlor, with nothing but sad memories in it.

title: Heat: Pedal to the Metal
description: High energy classic rock and video game tracks. Adrenaline pumping, high octance, full throttle racing music - push your car to the limit!

title: The Hunger
description: Bombastic classical compositions. Dark but grand, the tragedy of eternal life. The means to live like a king while being forced to hide in the shadows of the night.

title: The Loop
description: Big band jazz and swanky compositions. These time travel shenanigans are crazy I tell you, crazy!

title: Murder mystery games
description: General background music for solving riddles and finding killers with your friends!

title: Pandemic
description: Ambient and cinematic scores, underlined with a constant tenstion and stress. It's up to you to save the world, and the clock is ticking!

title: Sheriff of Nottingham
description: Fantasy medieval tunes. The bustling of a spring market or the dance in a crowded tavern. Let the money flow, the ale be drunk, and the sheriff be fooled!

title: Terraforming Mars
description: Sci-fi soundtracks for a new age of humanity. Technology has unlocked the future, and it's ours to claim!

title: Thebes
description: Historic folk music from Greece, Egypt and Mesopotamia. A sense of mystery and exotic discovery. A delve into history itself.

title: Ticket to Ride: GÃ¶teborg
description: Songs about Gothenburg. Humorous tunes, love letters, and a general celebration of the finest city in Sweden. Check your ticket and board the tram!
